txt.en: This hound appears to have been attacked by its own kind, a particularly vicious pair of hounds that has taken up residence nearby.\n\nAny creature that could menace its own kind so brutally must be a great threat to the Men of Stangard.

'I knew those hounds were vile creatures! I cannot believe that any animal would resort to devouring its own kind. It is a disgusting thought... I am glad you slew them, [placeholder]. I shudder to think of such beasts so near our walls.'
Several hound-corpses litter the dens. It appears that an especially vicious pair of pack-leaders has turned to eating their own kind.
Gripjaw and Dreadgaze are in the foetid caves.\n\nYou should defeat the two vilest hounds of all.
Sabert is at the gate of Stangard.\n\nYou should speak with Sabert of the two vile hounds you encountered in the foetid caves.
